mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cover_id AS "coverId", a.uploadid AS "uploadid", a.url AS "url", a.upload_by AS "uploadBy", a.upload_date AS "uploadDate", a.status AS "status"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cover_image( id, cover_id, uploadid, url, upload_by, upload_date, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{coverId}, #{uploadid}, #{url}, #{uploadBy}, #{uploadDate}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cover_image SET cover_id = #{coverId}, uploadid = #{uploadid}, url = #{url}, upload_by = #{uploadBy}, upload_date = #{uploadDate}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.* FROM cover_image a where ${propertyName} = '${value}'
